showScoreExcerpt:
“Whether or not you enjoy ’Shucked,’ Broadway’s new musical based on corn, both the kind you grow and the kind you write, depends mostly on your sense of humor. If you like a barrage of one-liners, often based on puns, potty humor or sexual innuendo, you’re in. Otherwise, you might find yourself bored or exasperated.”

Read more
